title: One Piece Drum Island Arc (78-91) Review
author: dlstudios
description: Comprehensive review of the Drum Island Arc covering episodes 78-91, discussing both the best and worst aspects of the arc including pacing issues and character development.

title: One Piece: Drum Island Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Staff
description: Detailed summary and review of the Drum Island Arc, highlighting the arc's excellence in character development and its lasting message about acceptance and hope. Covers Chopper's introduction and Wapol's defeat.

title: Netflix's One Piece has chosen the anime's first great arc as the climax for season 2
author: Popverse Staff
description: Analysis of the Drum Island Arc's significance, calling it a near-flawless representation of everything One Piece is about with humor, great fights, and an emotional climax. Discusses why it's considered the anime's first great arc.

title: One Piece – Drum Island Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: Comprehensive recap of the Drum Island Arc on TV Tropes, featuring detailed episode summaries and trope analysis.

title: One Piece Diaries #11 – Drum Island #1
author: Comic Con Staff
description: First part of a two-part diary-style review of the Drum Island Arc, following a first-time viewer's experience with the arc.

title: One Piece: Drum Island
author: Bladeslinger Reviews
description: Blog review criticizing Wapol as one of the worst villains in One Piece, analyzing the arc's strengths and weaknesses.

title: Luffy Vs Wapol | One Piece Pirate Warriors 3
description: Video gameplay of Luffy vs Wapol fight from the One Piece Pirate Warriors 3 video game.

title: Episode 89 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 89 containing episode details, plot summary, character appearances, and production information.

title: One Piece Special Edition (HD): Alabasta (62-135) Episode 89
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming page for Episode 89 on Crunchyroll featuring the conclusion of Luffy's battle with Wapol.

title: Episode 89 - IMDB
description: IMDB page for Episode 89 with a rating of 7.7/10, featuring user reviews and episode information.
